resources.string: No apps. To add an app, either click the + to choose from the installed apps, or go to the menu, and then press Reset to Default Apps to use the default list.
Some apps in the play store do not run if they detect root. RootCloak uses a variety of methods to prevent root detection.
To use RootCloak, add the app you want to prevent from detecting root to the list using the Add/Remove Apps section.
If the app is already running, you need to FORCE CLOSE it for the settings to take effect.
